subject: Extension of time period of panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1 & 2) - reg.

No. 5472)} Sub: Extension of time period of Panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1 & 2) reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No_ 2.1,23/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a Conciliation and Settlement  Mechanism for the early Resolution and Settlement of Claims arising out of the Contractual Disputes under the Contract Agreements with the Contractors/ Concessionaires/ Consultants in NHAI. The two Conciliation and Settlement Committees were constituted and   published vide Para 4.3 of Policy Circular No. 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017. As per Annexure-1 of the Policy Circular, the panel of Independent Experts approved under these Guidelines was valid upto 01.06.2020. 2 At present, the Composition of these two Committees are as under: Conciliation & Settlement Committee 1 Conciliation & Settlement Committee-2 Name of the Members Name of the Members Sh. Pradeep Kumar 1_ Justice |.P. Vasishtha (Retd:) 2 Sh. Y.S. Malik 2 Sh: AK. Upadhyay, 3. Sh: Surya Pal Singh Jain 3 Sh: V. V. Ranganathan 3. The tenure Iterms of the Committees were extended from 02.06.2020 to 01.06.2021 vide Policy Circular dated 02.06.2020, from 02.06.2021 to 01.06.2022 vide Policy Circular dated 24.05.2021, from 02.06.2022 to 01.06.2023 vide Policy Circular dated 18.05.2022, from 02.06.2023 to 01.06.2024 vide Policy Circular dated 28.04.2023, from 02.06.2024 to 15.06.2024 vide    Policy Circular dated 16.05.2024 and further extended from 16.06.2024 to 15.06.2025 vide Policy Circular dated 14.06.2024. 4 Now the Competent Authority has extended the tenurelterms of the aforesaid two Committees from 16.06.2025 to 15.06.2026. 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 3106/* (CS.
